title.rendered: Dirk Jan Osinga | Head of Salvage Consultancy

content.rendered:
Dirk Jan Osinga is a Master Mariner and Director of Salvage Consulting. He has long experience of salvage and wreck removal operations in addition to a detailed understanding of Client needs relating to tendering and the contractual requirements associated with salvage and wreck removal. He acts as AqualisBraemar’s technical lead in these matters and advises P&I Clubs, Lawyers and H&M insurers in all technical and commercial aspects of salvage and wreck removal work.

Discipline: Mariner
Specialism: Salvage Master
Expert Witness Expertise: LOF, Salvage Master, Wreck removal

Contact

London | +44 7464 675 497
Netherlands | +31 615 372 410

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salvage & Wreck Removal
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: At AqualisBraemar our consultants understand the importance of crisis management and the need for risk and cost mitigation. Prioritising the interests of our clients, combined with effective operational planning, integrated crisis and emergency response organisation is our single priority. Our established relationships with prominent contractors in the field enable us…
